member.name: IGlobalOptions.Query
member.summary: Queries the specified global property of the COM runtime.
member.param: The global property of the COM runtime. For a list of properties that can be set with this method, see .

param.name: pdwValue
param.para:
The value of the property.
Important For the COMGLB_APPID property, this parameter receives a pointer to the AppID GUID.

member.returns: The return value is S_OK if the property is queried successfully.

member.name: IGlobalOptions.Set
member.summary: Sets the specified global property of the COM runtime.
member.param: The global property of the COM runtime. For a list of properties that can be set with this method, see .

param.name: dwValue
param.para:
The value of the property.
Important For the COMGLB_APPID property, this parameter must specify a pointer to the APPID GUID.

member.returns: The return value is S_OK if the property was set successfully.
